discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment: The release managers for 1.11.0 think that the status of this PR is not clear. It looks that it depends on PR#259. Should it be postponed to milestone 1.12.0?

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> The release managers for 1.11.0 think that the status of this PR is not clear. It looks that it depends on PR#259. Should it be postponed to milestone 1.12.0?

yes, absolutely

tags.description: Issue or PR about addition of features.
PR that depends on another. Documented in the original post of the PR. Review only the increment.
Issue or PR that needs an assignee. Please volunteer.
